# Preparation

```{r}

library("readr")

wildschwein <- read_delim("Data/wildschwein_BE_2056.csv", ",")


library("sf")
library("dplyr")
library(ggplot2)

# Careful! What Timezone is assumed?
sabi <- wildschwein |>
    st_as_sf(coords = c("E", "N"), crs = 2056, remove = FALSE) |>
    filter(
      TierName == "Sabi", 
      DatetimeUTC >= "2015-07-01", 
      DatetimeUTC < "2015-07-03"
      )

ggplot(sabi) +
  geom_sf() +
  coord_sf(crs = 2056) +
  theme_minimal()

```
